document_data.name: ''Wings of Diabolicus''
document_data.mainbody: The '''''Wings of Diabolicus''''' was a deadly unique magic [[warhammer]] that could kill a living creature with one blow.
document_data.Description: The ''Wings of Diabolicus'' was a heavy two-handed warhammer decorated with [[bat]]-like wings.
document_data.Powers: Apart from possessing a +2 enchantment, the ''Wings of Diabolicus'' could cast the ''[[slay living]]'' spell of considerable power. This heavy two-handed maul could be used by [[clerics]].
document_data.History: In [[1369 DR]], this grim weapon could be found in the [[Halls of Stone]] of the [[Dwarven Dungeons]] of [[Myth Drannor]] in one of the chests far, in the most secluded are of the ruins. Upon opening the chest, its guardians became apparent, a [[shadow|master shadow]], leading four weaker shadows.
